summary.span: 启用基本 Windows 运行时功能。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空间文档仅包含投影不同于 WinRT 类型 Windows 运行时 (WinRT) 类型的 .NET 投影。This namespace documentation contains only .NET projections of Windows Runtime (WinRT) types where the projection differs from the WinRT type. 若要查看此命名空间的完整类型列表，请参阅 UWP API 参考中的 " [Windows Foundation](https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.foundation) "。To see the complete list of types for this namespace, see [Windows.Foundation](https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.foundation) in the UWP API reference.
